name: agentprivacy
description: Privacy-first AI agent architecture — 21 personas and 36 domain skills for dual-agent separation, ZKP systems, tokenomics, governance, and sovereign identity. Built on the Privacy Value Model V4.

skillsets.name: persona-skills
skillsets.description: 22 agent personas (8 swordsman, 7 mage, 7 balanced) for privacy-first AI operations. Each persona configures Claude with a specific privacy role — from ZKP engineering (Cipher) to healthcare privacy (Healer) to adversarial red-teaming (Sith).

skillsets.name: role-skills
skillsets.description: 26 domain knowledge skills covering cryptography, governance, economics, identity, dark forest strategy, narrative compression, and more. Loaded on demand by persona skills.

skillsets.name: privacy-layer-skills
skillsets.description: 9 foundational skills covering every term of the V(π,t) privacy value equation. Always loaded as the ground state for any agentprivacy operation.
